description: News about King of Spain Juan Carlos I, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: King of Spain Juan Carlos I
title_page: King of Spain Juan Carlos I - The New York Times
maintext:
Spainâ€™s Juan Carlos Makes a Big Tax Payment Amid New Financial Probe
The former king of Spain paid about $820,000, his lawyer said. He did not say why, but the news came amid the latest investigation into possible financial wrongdoing by Juan Carlos.
